attributes.action: Petition to get Matt Hancock sacked
attributes.additional_details: Matt Hancock has time and time again proven he is unbelievably unsuitable for his role, he’s done nothing but upset, anger and annoy the public. As the prime minister is voted into power by election I believe we as people should also have the right to vote an MP out if we believe they cannot do the job.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
